# Examples

## Purrr 
### data.frame - split - 2 models - extract results

```{r cars}
library(broom)
library(purrr)

x <- data.frame(letter = rep(c("A", "B"), 20), C = rnorm(40), D = rnorm(40))

df<- 
  x %>% 
  split(.$letter) %>% 
  map(~ list(lm(.$C ~ .$D),
               lm(.$C ~ .$D))) %>% 
  map(~ .x %>%  map(summary)) %>% 
  map(~ .x %>% map_dbl("r.squared"))

```
